    @pytest.mark.smoke
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case_name, case", yaml_data.items())
    @allure.feature("游戏模块")
    
    def test_games(auth_client, case_name, case, case_vars, check_extra_url):
    
        # case = case_vars(case)
        case["request"] = case_vars(case["request"])
    
        with allure.step(case_name):
    
            resp = auth_client.request(
                method=case["request"]["method"],
                url=case["request"]["url"],
                params=case["request"].get("params"),
                json_body=case["request"].get("body"),
            )
    
            # 仅检测 /game/games/l 的跳转链接
            if case["request"]["url"] == "/game/games/l":
    
                jp = parse(case["request"]["check_url_from"]["jsonpath"])
                matches = jp.find(resp.json_data)
    
                if not matches:
                    raise AssertionError("未找到跳转 URL")
    
                url = matches[0].value
                check_extra_url(url)
    
            # 核心断言
>           biz = assert_api_response(resp, case["expected"])

resp = ApiResponse(response=<Response [401]>, raw_text='{"code":40010,"message":"您的账号正在另一处登录, 请重新登录"}', json_data={'code': 40010, 'message': '您的账号正在另一处登录, 请重新登录'}, biz_json={'code': 40010, 'message': '您的账号正在另一处登录, 请重新登录'})
expected = {'allow_biz_codes': [200, 70001], 'allow_http_codes': [200, 400]}

    def assert_api_response(resp, expected):
        """
        通用接口断言（最终稳定版）
        - 以「业务 code」为主
        - HTTP 状态码只作为兜底
        - 语义清晰，TG / Allure 友好
        """
    
        # =====================================================
        # 0️⃣ 基础响应信息（永远先记录，防止断言中断）
        # =====================================================
        body = _safe_response_body(resp)
    
        http_status = getattr(resp, "status_code", None)
        logging.info(f"[HTTP] status={http_status}")
    
        _attach("response_body", body)
    
        biz_json = resp.biz_json or {}
    
        # =====================================================
        # 1️⃣ 业务 code 校验（核心）
        # =====================================================
        allow_biz = expected.get("allow_biz_codes")
    
        # 👉 只有在 allow_biz 为「非空列表」时才校验
        if isinstance(allow_biz, list) and len(allow_biz) > 0:
            biz_json = resp.biz_json or {}
            biz_code = _extract_biz_code(biz_json)
    
            # 兼容字符串数字
            if isinstance(biz_code, str) and biz_code.isdigit():
                biz_code = int(biz_code)
    
            logging.info(
                "[业务断言] 实际 code=%s | 允许=%s",
                biz_code,
                allow_biz
            )
    
            # 提取 msg（兼容多种字段名）
            biz_msg = (
                    biz_json.get("msg")
                    or biz_json.get("message")
                    or biz_json.get("errorMsg")
            )
            msg_suffix = f"，msg={biz_msg}" if biz_msg else ""
    
            # 🚫 要求业务 code，但接口没返回
            if biz_code is None:
                _attach("assert_fail_response", biz_json)
                raise AssertionError(
                    f"接口未返回业务code"
                    f"，HTTP={resp.status_code}"
                    f"{msg_suffix}"
                )
    
            try:
>               assert biz_code in allow_biz, (
                    f"接口返回的业务code {biz_code} "
                    f"不在允许范围 {allow_biz} 内"
                    f"{msg_suffix}"
                )
